  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>2be643c2-53c7-4b0c-a27c-c95139d8c6b9#1#2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Kis panda</string>
            <string language="en">Little panda</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kleiner Panda</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Petit panda</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Panda pequeno</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Panda piccolo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Λίγο panda</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Pequeño panda</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Az ázsiai trópusi hegyvidéki erdők lakója. Mindenevő. A medvefélék közé tartozik.</string>
            <string language="en">Inhabitant of asian tropical mountainory forests. Omnivorous. It belongs to ursidae.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">emlősök,  méhlepényesek,  ragadozók,  vörös panda,  Ázsia,  </string>
            <string language="en">mammals, placentalia, carnivores, red panda, Asia</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einwohner der asiatischen tropischen mountainory 
Wälder. Omnivorous. Es gehört ursidae.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Habitant des forêts mountainory tropicales 
asiatiques. Omnivore. Il appartient aux ursidae.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Habitante de florestas mountainory tropicais asian.
Omnivorous. Pertence aos ursidae.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Abitante delle foreste mountainory tropicali 
asiatiche. Omnivorous. Appartiene ai ursidae.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κάτοικος των ασιατικών τροπικών mountainory δασών. 
Παμφάγος. Ανήκει στα ursidae.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Habitante de bosques mountainory tropicales 
asiáticos. Omnivorous. Pertenece a los ursidae.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Säugetiere, placentalia, fleischfressende Tiere, roter Panda, 
Asien</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mammifères, placentalia, carnivores, panda rouge, Asie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">mamíferos, placentalia, carnivores, panda vermelho, Ásia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">mammiferi, placentalia, carnivori, panda rosso, Asia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">θηλαστικά, placentalia, carnivores, κόκκινο panda, 
Ασία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">mamíferos, placentalia, carnívoros, panda rojo, Asia</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>

version:3.0

fn:

        <metaMetadata>

            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet

    </metadata>
  </description>
